hook: 48 PRs merged this week. The robots are getting smarter, and the apps are getting stranger.
body:
·˚✿ POLLINATIONS WEEKLY ✿˚·
    vol.48 — agents & brainrot

→ POLLY API & OPENAI COMPATIBILITY
Polly now speaks fluent OpenAI. If you have existing tooling, you can point it at our endpoint and it should just work. We did this because learning new API specs is nobody's hobby.

───

→ SHOWCASE RENOVATION
The apps page got a facelift. Markdown descriptions, proper metrics, and a new badge system. It looks less like a directory and more like a gallery now.

───

→ AUTO POLLY
We shipped a self-healing repo agent. It finds issues and fixes them. Ideally, it puts us out of a job, but for now, it just saves us time.

───

→ NEW IN THE GARDEN
Community submissions included SlidePainter, Nova Defense, and something called BrainrotMaker. We provide the infrastructure; you provide the chaos.

───

→ HOUSEKEEPING
NPM packages moved to the @pollinations_ai scope. Please update your package.json before it yells at you.
closing: Code is open. Roadmap is open. Come build something weird.

reasoning: Uses the 'Dispatch' format to cover multiple disparate updates. The RPG quest log visual theme fits the 'leveling up' of the platform features. Tone is dry and observational, acknowledging the absurdity of an app named 'BrainrotMaker' while highlighting significant technical achievements like OpenAI compatibility.
